name: POSTWORLD
detailed_description:
STORY
You managed to escape from secret labs of ominous transnational corporation (TNC) where you were one of many subjects to inhumane experiments. Now you roam the wasteland hoping to survive and take revenge.
You will have to cooperate with 3 factions (Cultists, Railwaymen, Slavers) on the post-apocalyptic Russian landscape.
You may either join one of the factions and help it to destroy the others, or swim against the stream and become the Wasteland King!

ALPHA-BETA GAME FEATURES
  • Huge arsenal. We grant the player a large choice of devices to bring death and destruction with. Melee weapons, firearms, bulletproof shields, various ammo, explosives, stimulators and more!
  • Violence. Area-based damage system allows to shoot enemies’ body parts off but losing an arm and a leg does not matter to tough wasteland dwellers...
  • Weapon customization. Weapons are fully customizable. Any part can be replaced: barrels, hand guards, sights and buttstocks of firearms, as well as handles, guards and blades of melee weapons.
  • Global map. The wastelands are large, and the mechanics of travel between distinct game locations are inspired by the old skull RPGs.

RELEASE GAME FEATURES
  • Weapon customization. Weapons are fully customizable. Any part can be replaced: barrels, hand guards, sights and buttstocks of firearms, as well as handles, guards and blades of melee weapons.
  • Shields. From simple wooden bucklers that can hardly bear an axe blow, to high tech bulletproof shields equipped with built-in flamethrowers and stunning devices, they are all an essential part of equipment.
  • Non-linear plot. Quests that you receive depend on what decisions you have made and which one of 3 factions you have joined. One will have to beat the game multiple times to see all possible endings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel 2.4 Ghz or AMD 2.4 Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card, 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
